name: Carnivine
description: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.effect: You may draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
